message: Generic error message for server-side failures. Check application logs for stack traces.
The requested resource could not be found. Check URL and routing configuration.
Permission denied. Check user roles and resource permissions.
Invalid response from upstream server. Check backend service status.
Server is overloaded or down for maintenance. Try again later.
Authentication is required and has failed or has not yet been provided.
User has sent too many requests in a given amount of time. Rate limiting applied.
